35722.summary: Some customers in Headingly are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
35722.title: Apr 2 – Headingly | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
